about_the_game:
Game Introduction:

You must have experienced a lot of combat, strategy, decrypting, racing, and dazzling gameplay, so relax and experience the fun of building blocks for a change. With a simple, orderly build, give your character a gem to beat, and record your fastest challenge time. Simple plain, high mountain, lonely island. Five blocks, three maps, and three difficulty levels to get you through the boring hours. Forget the gems, don't put so much pressure on yourself, you can build your own castle, watch out for the collapse.

Development Introduction:

Collapse is the first project I created independently, inspired by children playing with blocks and memories of childhood playing with blocks. The process of the game is simple and the gameplay is random. The whole building blocks simulate the real physical accumulation. With the increase of the height, the possibility of collapse becomes higher. The scene is relatively open.

Special Notes

1. The anchor point of Building blocks is the center of the screen, need some time to adapt;

2. Building blocks is challenging thing, jumping is also challenging;

3. Made your own style through play games， completing the mission quickly and effectively;

4. Building blocks will be vary hard，more higher more challeger，you should be ready for control your trembling hand.
detailed_description:
Game Introduction:

You must have experienced a lot of combat, strategy, decrypting, racing, and dazzling gameplay, so relax and experience the fun of building blocks for a change. With a simple, orderly build, give your character a gem to beat, and record your fastest challenge time. Simple plain, high mountain, lonely island. Five blocks, three maps, and three difficulty levels to get you through the boring hours. Forget the gems, don't put so much pressure on yourself, you can build your own castle, watch out for the collapse.

Development Introduction:

Collapse is the first project I created independently, inspired by children playing with blocks and memories of childhood playing with blocks. The process of the game is simple and the gameplay is random. The whole building blocks simulate the real physical accumulation. With the increase of the height, the possibility of collapse becomes higher. The scene is relatively open.

Special Notes

1. The anchor point of Building blocks is the center of the screen, need some time to adapt;

2. Building blocks is challenging thing, jumping is also challenging;

3. Made your own style through play games， completing the mission quickly and effectively;

4. Building blocks will be vary hard，more higher more challeger，you should be ready for control your trembling hand.

mac_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: OS X Mavericks 10.10
  • Processor: Dual core from Intel
  • Memory: 2 GB RAM
  • Graphics: 1.5gb video card required to play. nVidia 320M, Radeon HD 2400, Intel HD 3000 or better
  • Storage: 1 GB available space

name: Collapse

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS *: Windows 7 or later
  • Processor: 2 GHz Processor
  • Memory: 2 GB RAM
  • Graphics: 1.5gb video card required to play. nVidia 320M, Radeon HD 2400, Intel HD 3000 or better
  • Storage: 1 GB available space
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system

short_description: Challenge your building skills, record the fastest time you can finish a game, and watch out for collapses
supported_languages:
English*, Simplified Chinese*
*languages with full audio support
